name: IDBRequest.onsuccess
description: The following example requests a given record title, onsuccess gets the associated record from the IDBObjectStore (made available as objectStoreTitleRequest.result), updates one property of the record, and then puts the updated record back into the object store. For a full working example, see our To-do Notifications app (view example live.)

refs.name: Indexed Database API 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'onsuccess' in the 'Indexed Database API 2.0' specification.
